TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompilerErrorCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个简单的集合对象，该对象可用于存储一组 对象。The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含在适用于所有成员的类级别继承要求。This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关继承要求的详细信息，请参阅[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about inheritance demands, see [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example demonstrates how to use the class. 该示例创建类的新实例，并使用几种方法将语句添加到集合，返回其索引，并添加或移除特定索引处的属性。The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
